mapper.select: select * from free_board order by free_board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into free_board( free_board_no, member_email, free_board_title, free_board_content, free_board_category ) values ( #{freeBoardNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{freeBoardTitle}, #{freeBoardContent}, #{freeBoardCategory} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM free_board where instr(${type},#{keyword})>0 ORDER BY free_board_no DESC) WHERE ROWNUM between #{begin} and #{end}
select * from attach where attach_no = ( select attach_no from free_board_image where free_board_no = #{freeBoardNo})
